title: Still A Lot More Work To Do In The Cannabis Industry
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Michael Auerbach, Founder and Chairman of Subversive Capital and The Parent Company (OTCQX:GRAMF) first came on for our first two SPAC Weeks and returns today to update us on GRAMF and the growth that hasn't shown up the way we expected. InterCure and the Israeli market. We also discuss his new ETF PUNK, which came on the scene and shorted Meta.
